%md
## Ingest tweets and weblogs into HDFS using Nifi

In this section we will:

1. Create a script which generates weblogs
2. Setup Solr for twitter
3. Create a Twitter App for accessing the Twitter API
4. Use NiFi to load tweets & weblogs into HDFS & SOLR

result.msg:
Ingest tweets and weblogs into HDFS using Nifi

In this section we will:

  1. Create a script which generates weblogs
  2. Setup Solr for twitter
  3. Create a Twitter App for accessing the Twitter API
  4. Use NiFi to load tweets & weblogs into HDFS & SOLR

paragraphs.title: 1. Script "weblog generator" script
paragraphs.text:
%sh
git clone https://github.com/abajwa-hw/single-view-demo.git
cp /home/zeppelin/single-view-demo/createlog-psql.sh /tmp
cp /home/zeppelin/single-view-demo/DimCustomer.csv /tmp

echo "/tmp/createlog-psql.sh /tmp/data/DimCustomer.csv 20 >> /tmp/webtraffic.log" >> /tmp/generate-weblog.sh

chmod 777 /tmp/createlog-psql.sh
chmod 777 /tmp/generate-weblog.sh
chmod 444 /tmp/DimCustomer.csv

paragraphs.title: 2. Configure Solr for Twitter
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo curl -ksSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abajwa-hw/single-view-demo/master/dashboard/default.json -o /opt/lucidworks-hdpsearch/solr/server/solr-webapp/webapp/banana/app/dashboards/default.json
sudo curl -L https://git.io/vVRPz -o /opt/lucidworks-hdpsearch/solr/server/solr/configsets/data_driven_schema_configs/conf/solrconfig.xml

sudo /etc/init.d/solr stop
sudo /etc/init.d/solr start
sleep 5

sudo /opt/lucidworks-hdpsearch/solr/bin/solr create -c tweets \
   -d data_driven_schema_configs \
   -s 1 \
   -rf 1

%md
#### 3. Create Twitter app & access tokens

To monitor tweets, you will need to do the following on your Twitter account:
- Create a Twitter account and app and get your consumer key/token and access keys/tokens:
  - Open https://apps.twitter.com 
  - sign in
  - create new app
  - the "Application Details" do not matter. Put whatever you want.
  - create access tokens

#### 4. Load our prebuilt Tempalte into NiFI

1. Download prebuilt Single_view_demo.xml template to your laptop from [here](https://github.com/abajwa-hw/single-view-demo/raw/master/template/Single_view_demo.xml)
2. Open Nifi webui (http://:9090)
3. Import the Single_view_demo.xml template info Nifi
4. Fill out env specific configs e.g. your Twitter credentials (see note below)
5. DO NOT start the flows yet

#### Next we will create a "weblog generator" script

  - ingest the weblogs under /tmp/tweets_staging in HDFS
